name: christina

services.title: Front-End Development
services.description: I build, style, and deploy responsive, high-performance websites for your business's needs.

services.description: My background in user-centric and accessible design provides me with the skillset to create intuitive and visually compelling user interfaces.

services.title: Webflow Development
services.description: Webflow is a visual code editor and it allows me to deploy visually stunning static websites for you, just within a few days.

services.title: User Research
services.description: Understanding your users' needs is an integral part of your product. I can help you uncover these insights and improve the user journey.
